name: gusplease
text: The Sistine Chapel of Achewoods.

name: deimosrising
text: If I were a woman I might be that woman

name: lizjones
text: I am a woman and I am THAT woman.

name: relaxing
text: Hey doll, is this guy boring you? Come and talk to me, I'm from a different planet!

name: deimosrising
text: You don't want any of that man she's from West Virginia

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Just let me go grab my bag.

name: deimosrising
text: Mostly Harmless was pretty underrated in my opinion

name: aelindil
text:
I dunno, that one always freaks me the fuck out for some reason.

Maybe I shouldn't read it on PCP.

name: semiquaver
text: Maybe because MH was pretty fucking freaky.  Maybe.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: That and I think MH might just be the saddest thing.

name: relaxing
text: chubby.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: The chubby has been reciprocated. Oh, and I got a book that had the first four (a while back) and I thought it was a complete set. A little while later I found mostly harmless and.. well I won't ruin the ending, but yeah... The End! No moral!

name: relaxing
text: love your pfsc icon.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: It is the result of the funniest thing and the saddest thing locking eyes over the magazine rack in the local supermarket

name: aelindil
text:
Oh god that sounds so awkward

SO AWKWARD.

name: ford
text:
I was kinda perturbed that they just offed Fenchurch right out the gate. I was like "But he was so happy..." It'd be like if Onstad killed Molly.

Note: The answers are "Yes it is" and "Yes I am." A chubby to whoever can guess the questions. (Hint: it's mentioned in another comment thread)

name: stuart
text:
Is the name a reference and... are you that fictional character? Or "Are you that big of a nerd"

Ooh! "Are you playing me to find The Question to The Answer like I'm some kinda Earth or something"

name: ford
text:
Looking back, my above post has a douche tone to it, and i apologize.

The questions are "Is that your real name?" and "Are you named after that fictional character?"

I was trying to brag to some other nerds about nerdy things. Scientists have recently determined that this is the worst kind of bragging.

name: aelindil
text:
Of all fictional sci-fi type characters to be named after, that's one of the better ones, I have to say.

Imagine the poor kid whose parents named him Riker or Davros. Or Slartibartfast.

name: i_love_kate
text: Oh, fuck. Should I not have named my daughter Slartibartfast?

name: damiel_billiams
text: so was Moistly Harmless

name: relaxing
text: Is that the name of a porno?

name: laikalost
text: Relaxing get's a big fat chubbie for the keen Hitchhiker's reference.  You, sir, rock.

name: spinynorman
text: Sigh. Prepare to get estalked, Liz Jones. Don't you know better than to be female and be on the internet, not to mention claiming to be attentive to the Needs of Nerds?

name: magb
text: Philippe is the best friend a guy can have.

name: straw
text: Phillipe is so rad

name: ghostd
text: chicks dig outer space.

name: littlefatdog
text: He did go to outer space. That's undeniably a turn-on for nearly all women.

name: tekende
text: Astronauts get mad rutty on a regular basis.

name: korukyu
text: It's true. According to Dr. McNinja, astronauts can win anything without even trying. Perhaps...even a lady's heart.

name: epicurus
text: Likewise, a female Kosmonaut would encounter few obstacles on her path to my love.

name: shutup_shutup
text: It is interesting to me that, apparently, astronauts are assumed to be masculine and cosmonauts to be feminine.  Because of girly communism?

name: honesttom
text: Now I'm going to be more sympathetic to mad people I meet. Maybe they're telling the truth, but in my cynicism I believe them insane. Thank you, Achewood, for opening my eyes!

name: f1shst1ck
text: I'd respond to that ad

name: tipist
text: When I first read this I misread the title as "Under Philippe's Wang", and it was creating all sorts of chaos in my brain.

name: erutangis
text: I wouldn't say it's my favorite, but I laughed harder at this Achewood than any other.

name: professorriffs
text: Panel three for the win.

name: mercuri0us
text: Damn I need a friend as rad as Phillipe.

name: ketelcat
text: Damn Philippe is a rad friend =)

name: mikeronomicon
text: Everyone needs Philipe for a friend. He is the raddest.

name: zapatos
text: Love of my life, would you like to hear about the time I took a holiday in outer space?

text:
We all need a philippe in our lifes! poor beef it must suck to have a 5 year old take you under their wing to and sort out your love life
